remarks: The value of the cardinal number function with an ordinal number as its argument.  Unlike ~ cardval , this theorem does not require the Axiom of Choice.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2003.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2013.)
statement:
oncardval $p |- ( A e. On -> ( card ` A ) = |^| { x e. On | x ~~ A } ) $.
$d A x $.
